lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]
south
surname Nan
Hunan Province in south central China, abbr. 湘[Xiang1], capital Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1]
Hunan University

sentences.english: Flood and drought are the predominant natural disasters in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 水旱災害是湖南省最嚴重的自然災害。

sentences.english: Lixian Vocational and Technical Institute, will always be for me, the number one institution in Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 澧縣職業中專學校，對於我來說，是湖南的第一職校。

sentences.english: Drought has caused major problems for boats that use the Xiangjiang River in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱給通過湖南省湘江河的船隻帶來嚴重的問題。

sentences.english: Chen's three sisters and his niece came for the ceremony from Huitong county in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 陳聚志的三個姐姐和侄女特意從湖南會同縣趕來。

sentences.english: For the reef or gin, the similar samples are the Permian reefs found in Huatang and Meitian of South Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 其成因與湖南晚二疊世的華塘礁與梅田礁很相似。

sentences.english: Pine mushroom is a local delicacy in Hunan province of China.
sentences.chinese: 湖南的松菌是深受當地羣衆歡迎的一種野生食用菌。

sentences.english: Huaihua city is an important forestry area in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 懷化市是湖南省的重點林區。

sentences.english: I’ve choked on the dust of Changsha in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 也曾在烏煙瘴氣的湖南長沙呼不給吸。

sentences.english: The Eucalyptus was the main pulp forest species in southern Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 桉樹已成爲湖南湘南地區栽培的主要紙漿林樹種。

sentences.english: I live in Yongzhou, Hunan Province, which is a very beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 我住在湖南省永州市，這是個非常美麗的城市。

sentences.english: In Hunan, products abound and economic trade has had a long history.
sentences.chinese: 湖南物產豐富，經濟貿易源遠流長。

sentences.english: President Carter and his wife visit Yuelu Academy.
sentences.chinese: 卡特及夫人蔘觀湖南大學嶽麓書院。

sentences.english: Satisfactory results were achieved in practical application.
sentences.chinese: 經湖南鎮水電站實際應用，效果理想。

sentences.english: Furong District is located in Changsha, the capital city of Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉區位於湖南省省會長沙市。

sentences.english: Hunan writer net successful meeting not I.
sentences.chinese: 湖南作家網一次成功的聚會沒有我。
